name: MakeCode Program
summary: An MKCD file is a program created using either the Minecraft or Chibi Chip Microsoft MakeCode editor. It contains either a program that can be used as a Minecraft for Windows 10 or Minecraft: Education Edition mod, or a program that can be installed on a Chibi Chip microcontroller. MKCD files are typically prepended with either minecraft or chibitronics , so you can tell which type of MKCD file you have.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
